main event: One orange and red object, very large, was seen by the observer to head across the sky toward the southeast and disappear. The sighting lasted for three seconds and was observed using binoculars.
interesting points: The object was seen moving southeast and disappeared quickly., The total length of the observation was only three seconds., The observer described the object as very large., The observation was categorized as a Ground-Visual type., There is a possibility that the sighting was astronomical in nature, possibly a meteor.
